Question
========
For `x <- c(10, 20, 30)`, which expressions return **20**? Select all that apply.

Answerlist
----------
* `x[2]`
* `x[x == 20]`
* `x[1]`
* `x[3]`

Solution
========
Index 2 is 20, and logical subsetting `x == 20` returns 20. Indices 1 and 3 return 10 and 30.
